content: crochet a fun sweater keychain with this quick and easy pattern makes a cute gift topper the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * keychain i used a 1″ keychain ring with a 1 25″ chain * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 2 x 3 5 5cm x 9cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/sweater-keychain-crochet-pattern/
